welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pendik, Turkey! Known for its beautiful coastal views and vibrant local markets, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Karina Balık
restaurants.description: Karina Balık is a seafood restaurant located in Pendik.
restaurants.address: Erol Kaya Cad. No:193 (ilhami soyal Bulvarı), 34890 Pendik- İstanbul

restaurants.description: Haveran İstanbul is a café located in Pendik.
restaurants.address: Pendik Sahil (Erol Kaya Caddesi, Gazipaşa Caddesi), 34890 Pendik

restaurants.name: Dersaadet Balıkçısı
restaurants.description: Dersaadet Balıkçısı is a seafood restaurant located in the city.
